attributes.action: Allow Gay men in NI to donate their blood
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.google.co.uk/amp/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/36435858# 

This is evidence to show that NI has a lifetime ban to gay people donating blood. Make a change. This is homophobia.
attributes.background: This is outrageous. Men who are gay should be allowed to donate blood to whom them want. Heterosexuals can get Aids too and they are allowed to donate blood, but in the hand gay people aren't because of their sexual orientation. Gay people can save other people's lives just like heterosexuals.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/

However, you might be interested to know that the lifetime ban was recently lifted:

https://www.health-ni.gov.uk/news/health-minister-michelle-oneill-lifts-lifetime-ban-blood-donation
